content:
Hi all,

When posting some FHIR bundles to a VONK server, I see regularly internal processing errors, caused by database table locks in VONK. The structure of the FHIR bundle is OK, but a transaction can cause a SQLIte Error 6 in VONK which means that the database table is locked. Any idea what could be the root cause of this problem?

Kind regards,
Werner

Hi @Werner De Mulder, thanks for bringing this issue to our attention. Can you share an example bundle with us that causes the error? If you like you can sent it here or via email to vonk@fire.ly. Can you also share the version of Vonk that you are using?

Hi @Alexander Zautke Thank you for you reply.
I've send an email to vonk@fire.ly

Kind regards,
Werner
